#summary start right now!

= Introduction =

Get the KKmulticontroller v5.5?
then start to play with it by following this guide.

= Before you start =

Please understand that it takes time and efforts to complete the whole setting. Do not suspect your KK board is defective unless you have already did a number of serious tests.

= What you need =
  * 1 KKmulticontroller v5.5
  * 1 Radio System(at least 4 channels)
  * 4 ESC
